That said, we rebalanced a lot more in 2018 and 2019 till date as a result of the excessive market volatility. This also mean clients can enjoy higher extra returns as we sell (take profit on) portfolio assets that performed well and buy portfolio assets that haven't performed that well at discounted prices.
